citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Official during the inspection process between 9:57-10:32 am
on 26-MAR-24. On arrival the inspector knocked on the house door and called out in the yard. A message was left at the
phone number on the account. A leave behind flyer was left on the shop door before leaving. The licensee called at
1:55pm to say his wife had been visiting a friend and he had been at work during the inspection time.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Official during the inspection process between 9:57-10:32 am 
on 26-MAR-24. On arrival the inspector knocked on the house door and called out in the yard. A message was left at the 
phone number on the account. A leave behind flyer was left on the shop door before leaving. The licensee called at 
1:55pm to say his wife had been visiting a friend and he had been at work during the inspection time.  
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
